jobDescription: POSITION OVERVIEW:Our client, located in San Diego, CA is looking for a Senior Data Scientist for detailed analysis work in a client facing role supporting account acquisitions, application decisioning rules, and account management. This is a financial services company which requires significant experience in the financial services, or banking, or fraud protection industries. Our client offers an exceptional benefit package and work/life balance resulting in very low turnover and long employment tenures. If you're looking for a position you can enjoy for years to come working on innovative technologies within an industry leader, this could be the position for you! This is a Direct Hire position, not C2C, not contract, with no visa sponsorships available of any kind, and we do not work with any third party consulting firms. You must currently live in the United States to be considered for this role. Please do not apply if you are looking for a contract position. This is not a remote position, and relocation is not available for this role, please consider that before applying.
